title: ion-slides
body:
The Slides component is a multi-section container. Each section can be swiped
or dragged between. It contains any number of

Adopted from Swiper.js:
The most modern mobile touch slider and framework with hardware accelerated transitions.
By default, Ionic slides use the built-in
animation effect. Custom animations can be provided via the
property. Examples of other animations can be found below.

angular: // Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance.
/* Without setting height the slides will take up the height of the slide's content */
javascript: // Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance.
/* Without setting height the slides will take up the height of the slide's content */
react: // Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance.
/* Without setting height the slides will take up the height of the slide's content */
stencil: // Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance.
/* Without setting height the slides will take up the height of the slide's content */
vue: // Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance. See http://idangero.us/swiper/api/ for valid options.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: options
props.docs: Options to pass to the swiper instance. See http://idangero.us/swiper/api/ for valid options

methods.name: getActiveIndex
methods.docs: Get the index of the active slide.

methods.name: getPreviousIndex
methods.docs: Get the index of the previous slide.

methods.name: getSwiper
methods.docs: Get the Swiper instance. Use this to access the full Swiper API. See https://idangero.us/swiper/api/ for all API options.

methods.name: isBeginning
methods.docs: Get whether or not the current slide is the first slide.

methods.name: isEnd
methods.docs: Get whether or not the current slide is the last slide.

methods.name: lockSwipeToNext
methods.docs: Lock or unlock the ability to slide to the next slide.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: lock If `true`, disable swiping to the next slide.

methods.name: lockSwipeToPrev
methods.docs: Lock or unlock the ability to slide to the previous slide.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: lock If `true`, disable swiping to the previous slide.

methods.name: lockSwipes
methods.docs: Lock or unlock the ability to slide to the next or previous slide.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: lock If `true`, disable swiping to the next and previous slide.

methods.name: slideNext
methods.signature: slideNext(speed?: number | undefined, runCallbacks?: boolean | undefined) => Promise<void>

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: runCallbacks If true, the transition will produce [Transition/SlideChange][Start/End] transition events.

methods.name: slidePrev
methods.signature: slidePrev(speed?: number | undefined, runCallbacks?: boolean | undefined) => Promise<void>

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: runCallbacks If true, the transition will produce the [Transition/SlideChange][Start/End] transition events.

methods.name: slideTo
methods.signature: slideTo(index: number, speed?: number | undefined, runCallbacks?: boolean | undefined) => Promise<void>

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: index The index of the slide to transition to.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: runCallbacks If true, the transition will produce [Transition/SlideChange][Start/End] transition events.

methods.name: update
methods.docs: Update the underlying slider implementation. Call this if you've added or removed child slides.

methods.name: updateAutoHeight
methods.docs: Force swiper to update its height (when autoHeight is enabled) for the duration equal to 'speed' parameter.

docs:
The Slides component is a multi-section container. Each section can be swiped
or dragged between. It contains any number of [Slide](../slide) components.


Adopted from Swiper.js:
The most modern mobile touch slider and framework with hardware accelerated transitions.

http://www.idangero.us/swiper/

Copyright 2016, Vladimir Kharlampidi
The iDangero.us
http://www.idangero.us/

Licensed under MIT

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

events.docs: Emitted after the active slide has changed.
Emitted when the user double taps on the slide's container.
Emitted when the slider is actively being moved.
Emitted when the next slide has ended.
Emitted when the next slide has started.
Emitted when the previous slide has ended.
Emitted when the previous slide has started.
Emitted when the slider is at the last slide.
Emitted when the slider is at its initial position.
Emitted when the user taps/clicks on the slide's container.
Emitted when the user releases the touch.
Emitted when the user first touches the slider.
Emitted when the slide transition has ended.
Emitted when the slide transition has started.
Emitted before the active slide has changed.

styles.name: --bullet-background-active
styles.docs: Background of the active pagination bullet

styles.name: --progress-bar-background-active
styles.docs: Background of the active pagination progress-bar

styles.name: --scroll-bar-background-active
styles.docs: Background of the active pagination scroll-bar
